other_title: 荒川アンダー ザ ブリッジ (Japanese)
plot: Kou Ichinomiya has always lived according to the creed of his wealthy, successful family: never be in debt to anyone. But one day, under the Arakawa Bridge, his life is saved by a homeless girl named Nino. In order to pay her back, Kou promises to be her boyfriend; and thus begins his new life under the bridge.
opening_theme: "Venus to Jesus" (ヴィーナスとジーザス) by Etsuko Yakushimaru
"Title Nante Jibun de Kangaenasai na" (タイトルなんて自分で考えなさいな) by Miyuki Sawashiro (ep 5)
ending_theme: "Sakasama Bridge" (逆様ブリッジ) by Suneohair
